CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Global Mofy Metaverse Ltd is a China-based technology solutions provider engaged in virtual content production, digital marketing and digital assets development for the metaverse industry. Utilizing its technology platform Mofy Lab, the Company creates three-dimensional (3D) high definition virtual version of physical world objects such as human, animal and scenes. The Company primarily operates its businesses through three segments: Virtual Technology Service segment, Digital Marketing segment and Digital Asset Development segment. Virtual Technology Service segment provides comprehensive technology solutions to assist customers in virtual content production. Digital Marketing segment provides advertisement production and promotion services to customers with integrated digital marketing services. Digital Asset Development segment engages in virtual content production business and opportunistic acquisition of certain digital assets.
